name: Massassi Base Sentry
Lore: 'Rebel sentries are stationed on raised sensor platforms. On watch for Imperial scouts and other hazards, they supplement data gathered by Yavin Base''s main sensors.',
Text: 'Deploy on Yavin 4; it is ''liberated.''  During battle at sites related to other ''liberated'' systems, may add 2 to power of each Rebel warrior (to a maximum of 4).  Once per turn, while you control this system, may retrieve 1 Force when you Force drain at another ''liberated'' system.',
